REUTERS.UNKNOWN: G C f0299 reute u f BC-TAIWAN-BUYS-27,000-TO 03-12 0096

TEXT.TITLE: TAIWAN BUYS 27,000 TONNES OF U.S. SOYBEANS
TEXT.BODY: The joint committee of Taiwan's soybean importers awarded a contract to Richco Grain Ltd of New York to supply a 27,000-tonne cargo of U.S. Soybeans, a committee spokesman told Reuters. The shipment, priced at 210.34 U.S. Dlrs per tonne c and f Taiwan, is set for delivery between March 20 and April 5, he said. Taiwan's soybeans imports in calendar 1987 are targetted at 1.81 mln tonnes, against an actual 1.74 mln tonnes imported in 1986, he said. All the imports come from the U.S., He added. REUTER
